review: I now have two of these. Both work like a dream. Initially I had to upgrade the firmware on my router, and they still lose contact with the router once every couple of months. But the ability to cast Netflix and YouTube to my TV more than makes up for an occasionally reboot of my router. I am amazed that such an inexpensive gadget works so well.
author: Greg McCollum

review: For the price this is an amazing product. Setup is quick and straightforward. As long as you have a decent wifi connection the Chromecast will work incredibly well. The only downside of this product is that it doesn't offer security in the event you share or use a public Internet connection. As long as the individuals sharing the wifi are respectful and don't stream random content to your device, the Google Chromecast is terrific.
